pt: {sc}boorish{/sc} {sc}churlish{/sc} {sc}loutish{/sc} {sc}clownish{/sc} mean uncouth in manners or appearance. {sc}boorish{/sc} implies rudeness of manner due to insensitiveness to others' feelings and unwillingness to be agreeable.
{sc}loutish{/sc} implies bodily awkwardness together with stupidity.
{sc}clownish{/sc} suggests ill-bred awkwardness, ignorance or stupidity, ungainliness, and often a propensity for absurd antics.
